Material used.Material Name: Lymphoblastoid cell line and blood cells from a patient heterozygous for p.Ala53Thr
Material used.Description: The study analyzed SNCA allele expression in a lymphoblastoid cell line and blood cells from a patient heterozygous for p.Ala53Thr.

Readout description.Result Description: The mutated allele (p.Ala53Thr) showed reduced expression compared to the wild-type allele, with no DNA methylation involvement.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal allelic expression levels (wild-type vs. mutant) require no significant imbalance.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant reduction in mutant allele expression compared to wild-type (p < 0.05).
